casebody.data:
In the Matter of: Appeal of Richard S. PACULA from the decision of the Brunswick County Board of Equalization and Review concerning real property taxation for tax year 2003.
appealed by Richard S. PACULA. No. 682P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Richard S. Pacula, Pro Se. Jana L. Berg, Assistant County Attorney, for Wake County/PTC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Appellant (Richard Pacula) on the 8th day of December 2005 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th day of January 2006."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 27th day of December 2005 by Appellant (Richard Pacula) to Quash Appellee's (Brunswick County) Motion to Dismiss, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th day of January 2006."
